headline: Enforcement and Removal Operations at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Security Specialist and Military Veteran with a Secret Security Clearance and over 9 years of proven experience in the United States Air Force.  Accomplished measurable results while leading teams of 44 in dynamic, fast - paced environments.  Possess a comprehensive background in Emergency Response derived from conducting domestic and global operations in Kuwait, Qatar, and Oman.  Managed risk upon multiple lines to protect assets, property, and equipment valued over $57B while exceeding the expectations of senior leadership.  Possess extensive knowledge in Physical Security Procedures.  Recipient of multiple awards for outstanding performance and professionalism.  Career supported by vast operational experience.

Department of Homeland Security/Immigration and Customs Enforcement/Violent Criminal Aliens Section.  Requested Certificates of Noncompliance from DA for trials; provided Deportation Officer with crucial documentation to convict immigration violators.  Assisted Deportation Officers with collections and labeling of evidence; ensured tamper free evidence for prosecution.  Conducted National Crime Information Center checks for personnel; located illegal immigrates with felony warrants.

positions.description:
Security Team Leader/Flight Sergeant
Led 44 security forces responsible for the safety of 8K personnel and 33 priority level 1-4 space and communications assets; guaranteed the security of resources valued over $57B.  Managed the emergency response actions and command/control for multiple incidents; secured the scene and provided emergency first aid to recover all patients.  Trained and mentored 16 junior personnel through 74 core tasks inherent to security procedures; increased organizational flexibility through 3 critical certifications with a 100% pass rate

Restricted Area Entry Controller
Provided protection for vital early warning system utilized by the President of the United States; delivered armed response for protection of personnel, equipment and resources from real or perceived threats.  Secured and safeguarded overseas airbase housing over $1.8B in aviation assets; monitored intrusion detection alarms and camera systems to determine alarm priority, and made required notifications.  Projected visible security and threat deterrence in support of a military and civilian community of over 13.9K personnel; ensured the continued safety and integrity of resources valued over $11B.
